00016 // 02 Feb 2002   Jeremy Siek

00019 #ifndef BOOST_TOKENIZER_JRB070303_HPP_
00020 #define BOOST_TOKENIZER_JRB070303_HPP_
00021 
00022 #include <boost/token_iterator.hpp>
00023 #include <cassert>
00024 namespace boost {
00025 
00026   
00027   //===========================================================================
00028   // A container-view of a tokenized "sequence"
00029   template <
00030     typename TokenizerFunc = char_delimiters_separator<char>, 
00031     typename Iterator = std::string::const_iterator,
00032     typename Type = std::string
00033   >
00034   class tokenizer {
00035   private:
00036     typedef token_iterator_generator<TokenizerFunc,Iterator,Type> TGen;
00037         
00038     // It seems that MSVC does not like the unqualified use of iterator,
00039     // Thus we use iter internally when it is used unqualified and
00040     // the users of this class will always qualify iterator.     
00041     typedef typename TGen::type iter;
00042     
00043   public:
00044     
00045     typedef iter iterator;
00046     typedef iter const_iterator;
00047     typedef Type value_type;
00048     typedef value_type& reference;
00049     typedef const value_type& const_reference;
00050     typedef value_type* pointer;
00051     typedef const pointer const_pointer;
00052     typedef void size_type;
00053     typedef void difference_type;
00054 
00055     tokenizer(Iterator first, Iterator last,
00056               const TokenizerFunc& f = TokenizerFunc()) 
00057       : first_(first), last_(last), f_(f) { }
00058         
00059     template <typename Container>
00060     tokenizer(const Container& c)
00061       : first_(c.begin()), last_(c.end()), f_() { }
00062     
00063     template <typename Container>
00064     tokenizer(const Container& c,const TokenizerFunc& f)
00065       : first_(c.begin()), last_(c.end()), f_(f) { }
00066     
00067     void assign(Iterator first, Iterator last){
00068       first_ = first;
00069       last_ = last;
00070     }
00071     
00072     void assign(Iterator first, Iterator last, const TokenizerFunc& f){
00073       assign(first,last);
00074       f_ = f;
00075     }
00076     
00077     template <typename Container>
00078     void assign(const Container& c){
00079       assign(c.begin(),c.end());
00080     }
00081     
00082     
00083     template <typename Container>
00084     void assign(const Container& c, const TokenizerFunc& f){
00085       assign(c.begin(),c.end(),f);
00086     }
00087     
00088     iter begin() const { return iter(f_,first_,last_); }
00089     iter end() const { return iter(f_,last_,last_); }
00090         
00091   private:
00092     Iterator first_;
00093     Iterator last_;
00094     TokenizerFunc f_;
00095   };
00096 
00097 
00098 } // namespace boost
00099 
00100 #endif
